title: BMC, research in progress
cleaned_text: At BMC we are dedicated to publishing the best open access journals across our portfolio of over 250 titles and are always striving to drive progress in biology, health sciences and medicine. With over 20 years of expertise in pioneering open access, you can trust our extensive experience to deliver high quality, impactful research and provide a supportive publishing experience for authors. If you believe, like we do, that openness, transparency and community focus should be at the heart of research publishing, then we would like to welcome you to the BMC family of journals. BMC is part of Springer Nature. Advance your research with BMC [Focus on: BMC Global & Public Health](https://bmcglobalpublichealth.biomedcentral.com/) Discover our recently launched selective journal publishing significant advances in all areas of global and public health. [Focus on: BMC Digital Health](https://bmcdigitalhealth.biomedcentral.com/) Find out more about our new inclusive journal publishing research on all aspects of digital technologies in medicine and public health. [The Sustainable Development Goals Programme](https://www.springernature.com/gp/researchers/sdg-programme?utm_source=bmc&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=RMarketing&utm_campaign=CMTL_1_RS_CMTL_SDGMain_BMC_SideTeaser) Springer Nature's Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Programme aims to connect the researchers who are tackling the world's toughest challenges with the practitioners in policy and business who need those insights. [Open Data at the BMC Series](https://www.biomedcentral.com/p/the-bmc-series-journals/open-data) The BMC Series is pioneering new approaches to data sharing and open data and we are committed to supporting researchers in sharing their data, helping to make data sharing the new normal.
